text: During the 1979–80 season Hearts competed in the Scottish First Division, the Scottish Cup, the Scottish League Cup and the East of Scotland Shield ==Fixtures== ===Friendlies=== ===League Cup=== ===Scottish Cup=== ===East of Scotland Shield=== ===Scottish First Division=== ==Scottish First Division table== ==Squad information== |} ==See also== *List of Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons ==References== *Statistical Record 79-80 ==External links== *Official Club website Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons Heart of Midlothian
